alert.note: Alert for Dickinson; Menominee (Michigan) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued December 22 at 3:19PM EST until December 23 at 1:00AM EST by NWS Marquette
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 1 AM EST FRIDAY... ...WINTER STORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 1 AM FRIDAY TO 7 PM EST SATURDAY... * WHAT...For the Winter Storm Warning, moderate snow and considerable blowing snow is expected. Two-day total snow accumulations of 2 to 4 inches are expected Friday through Saturday. Winds gusting as high as 45 mph. For the Winter Weather Advisory, snow. Additional snow accumulations of 1 to 3 inches expected through this evening. * WHERE...Dickinson and Menominee Counties. * WHEN...For the Winter Storm Warning, from 1 AM Friday to 7 PM EST Saturday. For the Winter Weather Advisory, until 1 AM EST Friday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. Patchy blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility. The hazardous conditions could impact the Friday morning or evening commute. Gusty winds could bring down tree a few branches and maybe even cause sporadic power outages.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. Slow down and use caution while traveling.
